ksef.description: KSeF API Configuration. Environment: 'test', 'demo', or 'prod'. Get token from KSeF portal.

pushover.description: Pushover notification settings. Get credentials from https://pushover.net/

monitoring.description: Monitoring settings. subject_types: Subject1 (sprzedażowe), Subject2 (zakupowe). date_type: Issue (data wystawienia) | Invoicing (data przyjęcia w KSeF) | PermanentStorage (data trwałego zapisu) — default: Invoicing. message_priority: -2 (cisza) | -1 (cicho) | 0 (normalne, default) | 1 (wysoka) | 2 (pilne, wymaga potwierdzenia). test_notification: send test on startup.

schedule.description: Schedule configuration. MODES: 'simple' (seconds), 'minutes' (minutes), 'hourly' (hours), 'daily' (specific time), 'weekly' (specific days and time). For 'simple'/'minutes'/'hourly': set 'interval'. For 'daily': set 'time' (e.g., '09:00'). For 'weekly': set 'days' array (e.g., ['monday','friday']) and 'time'.
